attributes.long-description:
The Need for Speed Most Wanted Ultimate Edition features everything you need to leave your competition in the dust, including Needs for Speed Most Wanted and 5 additional expansions. The Ultimate Speed Pack includes the Pagani Zonda R, McLaren F1LM, Bugatti Veyron Grand Sport Vitesse, Lamborghini Aventador J and Hennessey Venom GT Spyder. The Movie Legends Pack features the Aston Martin DBS 2008, Dodge Charger R/T 1970, Pontiac Firebird Trans-Am Special Edition 1977, Aston Martin DB5 Vantage 1964, and the Shelby GT500 1967. The Need for Speed Heroes Pack adds the Lamgorghini Diablo SV, Nissan Skyline GT-R R34 Spec II, Nissan 350Z, BMW M3 GTR, and the Porsche 911 GT2. The Terminal Velocity Pack introduces Hughes International Airport along with new cars, new milestones, modifications, and awards. Lastly the Need for Speed Booster Pack includes additional upgraded versions to 5 cars.

n/a
